verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which <WH834> came <WH1961> to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord, <WH3068> when Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> and all <WH3605> his army, <WH2428> with all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> that were under his dominion <WH4475> and all <WH3605> the peoples, <WH5971> were fighting <WH3898> against <WH5921> Jerusalem <WH3389> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> its cities, <WH5892> saying, <WH559>

"Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> 'Go <WH1980> and speak <WH559> to Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> and say <WH559> to him: "Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> 'Behold, <WH2009> I am giving <WH5414> this <WH384> city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and he will burn <WH8313> it with fire. <WH784>

'And you will not escape <WH4422> from his hand, <WH3027> for you will surely <WH8610> be captured <WH8610> and delivered <WH5414> into his hand; <WH3027> and you will see <WH7200> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> eye <WH5869> to eye, <WH5869> and he will speak <WH1696> with you face <WH6310> to face, <WH6310> and you will go <WH935> to Babylon. <WH894>' "'

"Yet <WH389> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord, <WH3068> O Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah! <WH3063> Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> concerning <WH5921> you, 'You will not die <WH4191> by the sword. <WH2719>

'You will die <WH4191> in peace; <WH7965> and as spices were burned <WH4955> for your fathers, the former <WH1> kings <WH7223> who <WH4428> were before <WH834> you, so <WH6440> they will burn <WH3651> spices for you; and they will lament <WH8313> for you, "Alas, <WH5594> lord! <WH1945>"' For I have spoken <WH113> the word, <WH1696> "declares <WH1697> the Lord. <WH5002>
Then Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spoke <WH1696> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> to Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389>

when the army <WH2428> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> was fighting <WH3898> against <WH5921> Jerusalem <WH3389> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> the remaining <WH3498> cities <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> [that is], Lachish <WH3923> and Azekah, <WH5825> for they [alone] remained <WH7604> as fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> among the cities <WH5892> of Judah. <WH3063>

The word <WH1697> which <WH834> came <WH1961> to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord, <WH3068> after <WH310> King <WH4428> Zedekiah <WH6667> had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> who <WH834> were in Jerusalem <WH3389> to proclaim <WH7121> release <WH1865> to them:

that each <WH376> man <WH376> should set <WH7971> free <WH2670> his male <WH5650> servant <WH5650> and each <WH376> man <WH376> his female <WH8198> servant, <WH8198> a Hebrew <WH5680> man <WH5680> or a Hebrew <WH5680> woman; <WH5680> so that no <WH1115> one <WH1097> should keep <WH5647> them, a Jew <WH3064> his brother, <WH251> in bondage. <WH5647>

And all <WH3605> the officials <WH8269> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> obeyed, <WH8085> who <WH834> had entered <WH935> into the covenant <WH1285> that each <WH376> man <WH376> should set <WH7971> free <WH2670> his male <WH5650> servant <WH5650> and each <WH376> man <WH376> his female <WH8198> servant, <WH8198> so that no <WH1115> one <WH1097> should keep <WH5647> them any <WH5750> longer <WH5750> in bondage; <WH5647> they obeyed, <WH8085> and set <WH7971> [them free.]

But afterward <WH310> <WH3651> they turned <WH7725> around <WH7725> and took <WH7725> back <WH7725> the male <WH5650> servants <WH5650> and the female <WH8198> servants, <WH8198> whom <WH834> they had set <WH7971> free, <WH2670> and brought <WH3533> them into subjection <WH3533> for male <WH5650> servants <WH5650> and for female <WH8198> servants. <WH8198>
Then the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>

"Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> 'I made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with your forefathers in the day <WH1> that I brought <WH3117> them out of the land <WH3318> of Egypt, <WH776> from the house <WH4714> of bondage, <WH1004> saying, <WH5650>

"At the end <WH7093> of seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> each <WH376> of you shall set <WH7971> free <WH7971> his Hebrew <WH5680> brother, <WH251> who <WH834> has been sold <WH4376> to you and has served <WH5647> you six <WH8337> years, <WH8141> you shall send <WH7971> him out free <WH2670> from you; but your forefathers did not obey <WH1> Me, or incline <WH8085> their ear <WH5186> to Me.

"Although recently <WH3117> you [had] turned <WH7725> and done <WH6213> what <WH3477> is right <WH3477> in My sight, <WH5869> each <WH376> man <WH376> proclaiming <WH7121> release <WH1865> to his neighbor, <WH7453> and you had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> Me in the house <WH1004> which <WH834> is called <WH7121> by My name. <WH8034>

"Yet you turned <WH7725> and profaned <WH2490> My name, <WH8034> and each <WH376> man <WH376> took <WH7725> back <WH7725> his male <WH5650> servant <WH5650> and each <WH376> man <WH376> his female <WH8198> servant, <WH8198> whom <WH834> you had set <WH7971> free <WH2670> according to their desire, <WH5315> and you brought <WH3533> them into subjection <WH3533> to be your male <WH5650> servants <WH5650> and female <WH8198> servants. <WH8198>"'

"Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> 'You have not obeyed <WH8085> Me in proclaiming <WH7121> release <WH1865> each <WH376> man <WH376> to his brother, <WH251> and each <WH376> man <WH376> to his neighbor. <WH7453> Behold, <WH2009> I am proclaiming <WH7121> a release <WH1865> to you,' declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> 'to the sword, <WH2719> to the pestilence, <WH1698> and to the famine; <WH7458> and I will make <WH5414> you a terror <WH2113> to all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth. <WH776>

'And I will give <WH5414> the men <WH376> who have transgressed <WH5674> My covenant, <WH1285> who <WH834> have not fulfilled <WH6965> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> they made <WH3772> before <WH6440> Me, [when] they cut <WH3772> the calf <WH5695> in two <WH8147> and passed <WH5674> between <WH996> its parts <WH1335> –

the officials <WH8269> of Judah, <WH3063> and the officials <WH8269> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> the court <WH5631> officers, <WH5631> and the priests, <WH3548> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> who passed <WH5674> between <WH996> the parts <WH1335> of the calf <WH5695> –

and I will give <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH340> and into the hand <WH3027> of those who seek <WH1245> their life. <WH5315> And their dead <WH5038> bodies <WH5038> shall be food <WH3978> for the birds <WH5775> of the sky <WH8064> and the beasts <WH929> of the earth. <WH776>

'And Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> and his officials <WH8269> I will give <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH340> and into the hand <WH3027> of those who seek <WH1245> their life, <WH5315> and into the hand <WH3027> of the army <WH2428> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> which has gone <WH5927> away <WH5927> from you.

'Behold, <WH2009> I am going to command, <WH6680>' declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> 'and I will bring <WH7725> them back <WH7725> to this <WH384> city; <WH5892> and they shall fight <WH3898> against <WH5921> it and take <WH3920> it and burn <WH8313> it with fire; <WH784> and I will make <WH5414> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> a desolation <WH8077> without <WH369> inhabitant. <WH3427>' "
